sentence: 4 ||| Introduction ||| 1.4 ||| The patients were considered eligible for the trial, if the age was ,75 years, there was an electrocardiogram (ECG) evidence of STEMI, elevated troponin levels, and thrombolytic therapy given within 12 h after the onset of symptoms, no need for urgent PCI immediately after thrombolysis, no cardiogenic shock, no rescue PCI due to chest pain, haemodynamic instability, or lack of resolution of ST-segment elevations after thrombolysis, no need for coronary artery bypass graft surgery, no refusal of the patient to participate, and no severe coexisting condition that interfered with the ability of the patient to comply with the protocol.
label: po.Age

sentence: 2 ||| Introduction ||| 1.2 ||| Therefore, we designed a randomized, placebo-controlled, double blind, twocentre FINnish stem CELL study (FINCELL) aimed at assessing the efficacy and safety of BMC therapy in patients with acute STEMI treated with thrombolytic therapy followed by PCI 2 -6 days later.
